publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1960.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: The Fire (Scotland) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-1960) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, insert at end "but, in so doing, seeks assurances from the Scottish Executive that the ministerial powers in part 1 of the Bill will not be used to amalgamate existing fire boards in Scotland."
